thread.title: Supreme court acquits murder convict Abdul Razzaq
thread.title_full: Supreme court acquits murder convict Abdul Razzaq

author: none@none.com (Web Desk)
title: Supreme court acquits murder convict Abdul Razzaq
text:
Supreme court acquits murder convict Abdul Razzaq
1 min read The Supreme Court has accepted the acquittal petition of Abdul Razaq, previously sentenced to death by the trial court and life imprisonment by the High Court.
A three-member bench headed by Justice Hashim Kakar heard the case, with the convict’s lawyer, retired Justice Sagheer Ahmed Qadri, arguing that witness statements and medical evidence did not support the conviction.
He requested a review and correction of trial procedures.
During the hearing, Justice Kakar remarked on declining legal practices, saying that earlier judges feared confrontation from the Bar President and lawyers, but now even lawyers “are no longer the same,” noting instances where mobile recordings were given to witnesses before statements were recorded.
